author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Robinhood Launches Micro Bitcoin, Solana and XRP Futures Contracts
description: The move expands its existing crypto futures offering to its nearly 26 million funded accounts.
content:
Robinhood (HOOD) has introduced micro futures on bitcoin 
, solana and XRP in the United States., expanding its existing crypto futures offering for its nearly 26 million funded accounts.Micro contr… [+699 chars]
